name: SpongeBob SquarePants Operation Krabby Patty
summary: Experience SpongeBob first-hand in 4 levels. Includes Invasion of the Patty Snatchers, Boating School 101, Hide n' Go Jellyfishing, Who Cut the Cheese and Save Me Money.
